channel.title: Server Code Generator 0.5
channel.description:
Hey guys recently I've been developing an Application that will help alot of players out there that use a Silab Base [Server/Source]. Some people cannot understand some bits of codes and ussauly post random spam on the forums asking for help. So here is the "Server Code Generator 0.5". It is not Coded in Java/JavaScript, But the Output/What it Generates is!
Version 0.5:- + Support for SilabSoft Bases + Add Item Function + Teleport Function [FULLY Customizable] + Add Money Function [Simplified from Add Item] + Master EXP + Pure EXP + Noted Barrows [Customizable Amounts] + Rares Here are a few Screenshots of what it looks like at the moment. Don't Forget your Suggestions Count. Also Please do not suggest Support for other Server Types since they will be releases as time passes!
Main Menu [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24b4v37.jpg[/img]
Silab Coding Main Menu [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/fazcxt.jpg[/img]
Teleport Commands - SILAB [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28sas75.jpg[/img]
Various Other Codes [Includes Master, Rares ect.] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2dlk9rn.jpg[/img]
Add Item Commands - SILAB [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2znmwx3.jpg[/img]
I have 2 Download Links: 1 is an Attachment to this Post, The second is Downloaded [url=http://uppit.com/v/GEH33O57]HERE[/url]
Hope you guys like it, The next version will have more features and maybe compability for, 377/Delta Servers. Hope you guys liked it. Now for the Credits! << Credits >> Programming: Pure2Ownage [aka. Pure2Veteran/MW2Guru] = 48% Silab Coding Base: Universal Scape by Runefreak10 = 1% && RuneStuff PK by M00 M00 Pk = 1% Other Credits:- Acamar [MSDN] 10% Bill Gates II [MSDN] 10% $MvP [Google] 10% ra_smith [MSDN] 10% bdbodger [MSDN] 10% [NOT ACCURATE PERCENTAGES!]

item.title: Server Code Generator 0.5
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Mitko:

People need to learn how to do this manualy using notepad and not tools. But still, some people don’t want to learn doing it manualy so they look for such tools, This reminds me of when i was a newbie where i used to make commands and shops with such tool xD. Good job, I will rep you for the effort.

Thanks Mate, If you press the buttons without typing the additional info you will get a template of how to code it
Everyone has to start somewhere. Might as well make it here

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

great idea, I will build up on it, May take a few days for full NPC Drops [Real Ones]

EDIT: Version 0.7 - To be released in a couple of days.
So far added to it:

  • 10 More Various Commands,
  • 5 of which FULLY CUSTOMISABLE WITH “AMOUNT” TextBox
    It will also contain AutoSpawn Codes & NPC Drops

item.title: Server Code Generator 0.5
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

How about NPC spawning, Random Drops and also WHICH items a specific NPC drops and others along that line.

I’m not sure about the banning, it’s either through the server’s files or by command ::banuser or ::ipban, or something simillar.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Code Generator 0.5
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

neXuscoder:

Cool,but exist anythink like this for 508’s ?

Mate I will update to give commands for 508s very soon. Just tryna finish off the classic 317 :D.
Any help getting me premade commands will help as i will edit them and put it onto the application.

[quote=“Pure str433, post:5, topic:331483”]Impressive and also very useful. A wider variety needed though for “Other Commands”.

Nice one mate ;)[/quote]

Thanks, I will add alot more im just trying to find out some stuff. E.g. does every 317 use the same banning method.

In other news, If you guys get any errors please post it as a image/writing so i will build up on it!

Read full topic
